name: record-deck
description: Smooth BLDC with a positional encoder, via a constant jerk model with input smoothing via a kalman filter, suitable for low to high (28k) rpm applications

scripts.simulate:bldc: npm run test:venv && bokeh serve --show tracking/simulating-duty-motor.py
scripts.simulate:double-pendulum: npm run test:venv && python datasets/process-double-pendulum.py ${npm_config_dataset} > datasets/data/double-pendulum/data${npm_config_dataset}.csv && bokeh serve --show tracking/pendulum-state-estimator.py --args ${npm_config_dataset}
scripts.smooth:rotation-voltage-data: npm run test:venv && cross-var bokeh serve --session-token-expiration=900000 --show calibration/smooth-rotation-voltage-data.py --args $npm_config_dataset
scripts.inspect:rotation-voltage-data: npm run test:venv && cross-var bokeh serve --port 8033 --show calibration/tune-rotation-voltage-data-smoothing.py --args $npm_config_dataset
scripts.inspect:zero-crossing: npm run test:venv && cross-var bokeh serve --port 8033 --show calibration/zero-cross-inspect.py --args $npm_config_dataset
scripts.update:venv-deps: npm run test:venv && pip3 freeze > pip.freeze
